building_details.building_ref: Block D, E, F and G

site_name: Land Rear Of 13 To 73 Stafford RoadDuppas Hill RoadCroydon
description: Erection of buildings comprising 211 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) and a Community Hub (flexible Use Class F.1/F.2), ranging from three to six storeys together with associated parking, access, community and play space, amenity areas and hard and soft landscaping.
